channel.title: Illinois on Jared DeHaan's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in Illinois on Jared DeHaan's Github Site

item.title: Illinois missed their chance
item.description: Illinois was a heavy favorite to win the 2021 NCAA Basketball National Championship but instead got ousted by the NCAA powerhouse Loyola Chicago in the Round of 32. I will be digging deep into stats to discover exactly why Illinois exited the tournament earlier than expected. I first loaded tidyverse into my project. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.
